inclusion.criterion: Organic mitral valve regurgitation with effective regurgitation orifice (ERO)>0.3 cm2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) > 60% assessed by echocardiography
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to perform bicycle exercise testing
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Ischemic or functional (secondary) mitral valve regurgitation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Hemodynamic significant aortic valve disease assessed by echocardiography.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 34 year old woman with Marfan's syndrome and known severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, who was planned for a MV repair but was lost to follow-up. She remains symptomatic and is now prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery.
